data.name: Tiger Knight: Empire War - Arms Pack
data.detailed_description:
Including:
Extend Barrack Token x 5
Soldier Seal – A x 5
Copper x 50000
—————
The Extend Barrack Token can add one barrack.
The Soldier Seal – A helps the general to increase 50% gains of the soldiers during the next 8 battles.
data.about_the_game:
Including:
Extend Barrack Token x 5
Soldier Seal – A x 5
Copper x 50000
—————
The Extend Barrack Token can add one barrack.
The Soldier Seal – A helps the general to increase 50% gains of the soldiers during the next 8 battles.
data.short_description: This DLC will help your troop and soldiers to grow fast.
data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 32bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual core or equipment
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx9 compliant graphics card with 1024MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 64bit
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz 4 core or equipment
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx11 compliant graphics card with 2048MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
